text: Basilone may refer to: ==People== *Basil (name), a name of which "Basilone" is a variant *John Basilone (1916–1945), an American soldier and U.S. Marine, recipient of the Medal of Honor ==Ships== *, a United States Navy Gearing- class destroyer in commission from 1949 to 1977 *, a planned United States Navy Arleigh Burke-class guided-missile destroyer
title: Basilone
